section.name: EJBCA
section.p: EJBCA is a fully functional Certificate Authority. Based on J2EE technology it constitutes a robust, high performance and component based CA. Both flexible and platform independent, EJBCA can be used standalone or integrated in any J2EE application.
This software is OSI Certified Open Source Software. OSI Certified is a certification mark of the Open Source Initiative

section.name: Support
section.p: Commercial support for EJBCA is available in Sweden through PrimeKey Solutions.
